name: YumeCore
description:
• Story

Girl in hospital "Soboko" has a lucid dream
Soboko will treat a patient who is rampaging in a dream as a temporary nurse in a lucid dream, but this strange dream has a secret ...

  • Fusion of action ADV and belt scroll

This game is not just about fighting!
Players can switch between dreams and reality
You get an item advance the fight with you explore the hospital freely and freelySilence the patients raging in a dream with violence!

  • Unique enemy characters

There are kawaii and strange characters such as a child that throws water , a long child, a very long child, a child who is hopping, etc.
At the end of the stage there is a big boss fight!
